pageProduct.name: Alkira Hydrating Purifying Facial Scrub 125ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Gentle + Creamy + Complexion Correcting. Gently sweep away dead skin cells using Bamboo grains in a luxurious cream base to keep skin soft and hydrated post scrub.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Australian native complex of Lilly Pilly and Desert Lime delivering vitamin C and EFA rich Kangaroo Paw • Gentle Bamboo grains to sweep away dead skin cells (no microbeads in our products) • Flavone Glycosides and Ferulic Acid - potent antioxidants to fight free radical damage and protect skin • Naturally occurring natives rich in vitamin C and AHA’s to reveal clear skin • Essential fatty acids and phytonutrients to strengthen the skin’s barrier and lock in moisture • A hyper hydration and skin repairing combination of Rosehip, Jojoba, Aloe Vera and Sesame to offer long lasting moisture and a protective layer that ensures your skin is silky soft post scrub.

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Powder, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Syzygium Luehmannii (Lilly Pilly) Fruit Extract, Arctium Lappa (Burdock) Fruit Extract, Citrus Glauca (Desert Lime) Fruit Extract, Equiestum Arvense (Horsetail) Leaf Extract, Anigozanthos Flavidus (Kangaroo Paw) Flower/Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Vanillin, Tocopherol (vitamin E), Water (Aqua), Xanthan Gum, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene* Linalool* *Allergens

Directions

Gently massage onto damp skin using circular motions. Rinse with warm water and pat dry. Avoid contact with eyes. Use 1-2 times weekly or often as required.
